thread.title: Katie Holmes in a ballgown stops traffic on NJ Transit
thread.title_full: Katie Holmes in a ballgown stops traffic on NJ Transit

author: Vicki Hyman | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Katie Holmes in a ballgown stops traffic on NJ Transit
text:
Katie Holmes in a ballgown stops traffic on NJ Transit katie-holmes-new-jersey-transit Comments 
If her film career never takes off again, at least Katie Holmes has a future as a New Jersey Transit cover girl. 
Holmes posted a photo of herself on Instagram this week wearing a dramatic strapless red ballgown and boarding a New Jersey Transit train at New York's Penn Station. 
But a source tells Entertainment Tonight that the actress, seen most recently on Showtime's "Ray Donovan," is hardly a regular on the Morris and Essex line: She actually had been posing for a photo shoot a year ago and decided to play art director, leading the photo crew into Penn Station and pretending to board New Jersey Transit. "It was all rogue â€” her idea," the source says. A photo posted by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Oct 7, 2015 at 9:31pm PDT TV HANGOVER, EP. 4: 'The Leftovers' returns, 'Quantico' soars and Vicki interviews 'The Voice' contestant
